name: Space electrician
description:
Space electrician is a classic falcon in a space setting where the player will have to help, a small, green alien who works as an electrician on a huge spaceship.
The task is to move power supplies to special places to power the ship's systems with electricity. With each level, the task will become more complicated, so you will have to think hard to solve the next puzzle ... good luck!

Features:
-Nice graphics
-25 levels
-funny music
